Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individual to be a Member of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council for the remainder of a five-year term, expiring January 15, 2023:President Donald J. Trump appointed the following individuals to be Members of the Council of Governors for terms of two years:
